## post__api_Gateway_{gatewayId}_Invoice_CalculateFees

`POST /api/Gateway/{gatewayId}/Invoice/CalculateFees`

> Body parameter

```json
{
  "allOf": [
    {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "lineItems": {
          "type": "array",
          "items": {
            "required": [
              "discount",
              "quantity",
              "unitPrice"
            ],
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "quantity": {
                "type": "integer",
                "format": "int32"
              },
              "unitPrice": {
                "pattern": "^\\d+(\\.\\d{1,2})?$",
                "type": "number",
                "format": "double"
              },
              "discount": {
                "pattern": "^\\d+(\\.\\d{1,2})?$",
                "type": "number",
                "format": "double"
              },
              "freightAmount": {
                "pattern": "^\\d+(\\.\\d{1,2})?$",
                "type": "number",
                "format": "double",
                "nullable": true
              },
              "localTaxPercent": {
                "pattern": "^[-+]?(?:\\d{1,14}(?:\\.\\d{1,4})?|\\.\\d{1,4})$",
                "type": "number",
                "format": "double",
                "nullable": true
              },
              "nationalTaxPercent": {
                "pattern": "^[-+]?(?:\\d{1,14}(?:\\.\\d{1,4})?|\\.\\d{1,4})$",
                "type": "number",
                "format": "double",
                "nullable": true
              },
              "isTaxable": {
                "type": "boolean",
                "nullable": true
              }
            },
            "additionalProperties": false
          },
          "nullable": true
        },
        "shippingState": {
          "maxLength": 3,
          "type": "string",
          "nullable": true
        }
      },
      "additionalProperties": false
    }
  ]
}
```

```json
          "maxLength": 6,

          "nullable": true

          "format": "double"

          "type": "string",
          "format": "uuid"

      },

  ]
}
```

```json
{
```
```json
  "required": [
```
```json
    "addTaxToTotal",
    "baseAmount",
    "creditCardBin",
    "processorId"
  ],
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "creditCardBin": {
      "maxLength": 6,
      "minLength": 0,
      "pattern": "^[0-9]*$",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "state": {
      "maxLength": 3,
      "type": "string",
      "nullable": true
    },
    "baseAmount": {
      "pattern": "^[-+]?(?:\\d{1,14}(?:\\.\\d{1,4})?|\\.\\d{1,4})$",
      "type": "number",
      "format": "double"
    },
    "paymentAdjustmentType": {
      "enum": [
        "NoAdj",
        "Flat",
        "Percentage"
      ],
      "type": "string",
      "nullable": true
    },
    "paymentAdjustmentValue": {
      "pattern": "^[-+]?(?:\\d{1,14}(?:\\.\\d{1,4})?|\\.\\d{1,4})$",
      "type": "number",
      "format": "double",
      "nullable": true
    },
    "addTaxToTotal": {
      "type": "boolean"
    },
    "taxAmount": {
      "pattern": "^[-+]?(?:\\d{1,14}(?:\\.\\d{1,4})?|\\.\\d{1,4})$",
      "type": "number",
      "format": "double"
    },
    "processorId": {
      "type": "string",
      "format": "uuid"
    }
  },
  "additionalProperties": false
}
```
